about_the_game:
If you loved The Wreck, you can back us with this Supporter Pack!

This pack contains:
- A Digital Devbook (a mix between an Artbook & a developer's journal). You will be able to discover more about the genesis of the game, the first prototype, the characters and even more!
- 5 wallpapers to pimp your computer
- 5 wallpapers to beautify your mobile

We hope you will enjoy them! You can find the files here: common\The Wreck\The Wreck - Supporter Edition
detailed_description:
If you loved The Wreck, you can back us with this Supporter Pack!

This pack contains:
- A Digital Devbook (a mix between an Artbook & a developer's journal). You will be able to discover more about the genesis of the game, the first prototype, the characters and even more!
- 5 wallpapers to pimp your computer
- 5 wallpapers to beautify your mobile

We hope you will enjoy them! You can find the files here: common\The Wreck\The Wreck - Supporter Edition

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Mojave or newer
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560X or better
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 7 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
